answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hello Ronald,
You must be looking for ICMA-RC. (Although they are affiliated, ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.) You can reach ICMA-RC by calling 1-800-669-7400 or visiting www.icma-rc.org.

author: Ronald Kirkpatrick
text:
I haven't received my 2011 tax info yet.  If already sent, can you please send it again?  Address- POB 19547 Colorado City, Colorado  81019.  Thanks!
Ronald Kirkpatrick
title: 2011 tax info
